pr_title: JENKINS-61285 Fix blank page on configure clouds if no cloud plugin installed

timeline.message:
JENKINS-61285 Fix blank page on configure clouds if no cloud
implementation

timeline.bodyText: Would be nice if we could apply the "cloud" or "cloud-provider" label filter in URL. Could be a great symbiosis with @daniel-beck 's labeling PR
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

replies.bodyText: Is there a way to do that currently? all the filtering seems to be done client side from what I can tell
replies.author: timja

replies.bodyText: Nice idea, but way out of scope.
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText:
We could link to https://jenkins.io/doc/developer/extensions/jenkins-core/#cloud but that's almost user-hostile. That would be easy enough to do here.
I did something similar in the Build Authorization Monitor due to lack of alternatives.
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: Anyway, can be done in a follow-up
replies.author: oleg-nenashev
